NTUIM: Department of Information Management, National Taiwan University

DESC.1: Michael is a master student of BAEIR Lab at National Taiwan University. His research interests include Information Retrieval, Data / Text / Web Mining, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Data Mining for BigData. He is also a programmer, a web developer or so-called Rubyist.
DESC.2: He loves to take participate in technology conference occasionally to keep learning new things. Michael thinks the world where everyone has the power to share knowledge, so he got involved with trying to keep everything in his blog.
DESC.3: Skill keywords: Ruby, Java, Web development, python, data mining, R, Hadoop, Angular.js
